name: 리프 인 부트스트랩 - LEAP IN BOOTSTRAP
name_original: 리프 인 부트스트랩 - LEAP IN BOOTSTRAP
description:
synopsis
"When is the moment you want to forget the most?"
Park Soo-ah, a geek high school girl, and Shin Ha-yeon, a grumpy tsundere, and A, a high school student, are members of the science club.
Those who gathered to prepare for the school summer festival lost their minds in the heat of summer vacation
Park Soo-ah, tired of the lame entry, declares the invention of the time machine...?
Manipulate the past, make the future! "Leaf in Bootstrap", here we go!

Producer Information
Produced by Eugene Games
Illustration: Halla Tangerine
Shin Ha-yeon as Lee Eun-jo LEE EUN JO
Park Soo-ah as Herela HEOELLA
Directing: Choi Jinwoo CHOI JIN WOO [PLUSDICTION DIRECTOR]
Recording: Olje Studio OLZE STUDIO

Game play
Within 15 days of repetition, different routes will proceed according to the user's choice.
The game is played sequentially from day 1 to day 15, and for some routes, the day of the week may be omitted.
At the end of Day 15, the ending will be printed and will return to Day 1.
Some routes affect the cancellation of other routes. Even if you exit the game, the cancellation will be maintained.

Manipulation
Select: Left-click
Line progression: left click, scroll down mouse, enter key
Skip image: Keyboard ESC key

Resolution
The game is fixed at a resolution of 16:9 for optimal play.
Please refer to this when adjusting the resolution.

※The game contains some sensational elements. (There is CG wearing a bikini on the beach) ※
※The game contains some violent elements. (There is a bloody expression of death.) ※
